name: Ravage Road
storyline: The game follows you, a Road Expansion Manager hired to build a road leading out from the towers constructed by your Evil Overlord in order to conquer various regions of the world. You must hire various goons, including goblins, orcs and dragons, to build defenses against incoming enemy heroes who seek to topple your tower and free their region from the looming threat of your Overlord.
summary: Ravage Road is an indie tower defense game with deckbuilding and roguelike elements that allows the players to control and build out the road they must defend using placed tiles in addition to building towers from cards in their deck.
